mapper.select:
select vehicle_identity_no as vin, invoice_code, invoice_number as invoiceNo, total_price_lower_case as totalAmount, amount, tax_amount as tax, invoice_date, status from output_invoice_motor
AND vehicle_identity_no like concat('%', #{vin}, '%')
and invoice_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y/%m/%d')
and invoice_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y/%m/%d')
order by invoice_date DESC
